<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6395) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6394)

</column>

---

You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning. Choose one enemy. [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305), [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390) against that opponent, and then make a Strike against it. For your Feint, you can attempt a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) check instead of the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) check that's usually required, using the terrain around you to surprise your foe.
name: Scout's Charge
